Reviews.Title: recommend this camera
Reviews.Author: lela pool
Reviews.Content: This camera is an awesome camera.  For the cost it has exceeded our expectations. We would recommend this camera for any one from beginner to professional

Reviews.Title: a+++++
Reviews.Author: Patti
Reviews.Content: my daughter loves it, takes very good pics.  I even used it today myself.  great price and love it. thanks

ProductInfo.Features:
This kit includes 12 items, Camera includes all manufacturer's supplied accessories & Warranty, Additional accessories are backed with Hot Deals Electronics 1 year 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
Canon PowerShot SX170 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 16x Optical Zoom and 720p HD Video (Black)
32 Gigabyte SDHC (Secure Digital High Capacity) Memory Card - SD USB Memory Card Reader - Universal Memory Card Wallet
Additional NB-6L Rechargeable Lithium ion Replacement Battery - AC/DC (home/car) Battery Charger - Protective Digital Camera Carrying Case with Neck Strap & Belt Loop
Full Size 50" Tripod w/case - Flexible Mini Table Top Tripod - Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - Package of LCD Screen Protectors - HeroFiber® Ultra Gentle Cleaning Cloth (the most effective way to clean all optical surfaces)
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot SX170 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 16x Optical Zoom and 720p HD Video (Black) + NB-6L Battery & AC/DC Battery Charger + 9pc Bundle 32GB Deluxe Accessory Kit w/ HeroFiber Ultra Gentle Cleaning Cloth
